mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(P_NO),P_NO FROM REVIEW GROUP BY P_NO ORDER BY COUNT(P_NO) DESC, P_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(P_NO),P_NO FROM REVIEW GROUP BY P_NO ORDER BY COUNT(P_NO) DESC, P_NO DESC) Q JOIN (SELECT P.P_NO, FLOOR(NVL((MAX(P_GOOD)-MAX(P_BAD)) / DECODE(MAX(P_GOOD), 0, NULL, MAX(P_GOOD)), 0)*100)"p_good" FROM PLAY P JOIN REVIEW R ON (P.P_NO = R.P_NO) GROUP BY P.P_NO,P_GOOD,P_BAD ORDER BY COUNT(P.P_NO) DESC, P.P_NO DESC) S ON(S.P_NO =Q.P_NO ) WHERE ROWNUM < =10
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW ORDER BY R_GOOD+R_BAD DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT P_NO,FLOOR(NVL((MAX(P_GOOD)-MAX(P_BAD)) / DECODE(MAX(P_GOOD), 0, NULL, MAX(P_GOOD)), 0)*100)"p_good" FROM PLAY GROUP BY P_NO
